tha-ap15:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
tha-ap15:1.4_0: He is the great hermit with the great hermit.
tha-ap15:3.2_0: skilled at piling up the unskillful.
tha-ap15:3.3_0: Gotama, the disciple of the Buddha,
tha-ap15:4.1_0: A lustful person whose ethical conduct is
tha-ap15:4.2_0: I’m swept away by sensual pleasures.
tha-ap15:4.3_0: But the true-dmitted by the Buddha,
tha-ap15:4.4_0: But you’ll go forth with you.
tha-ap15:5.1_0: Please go forth when you’ve gone forth,
tha-ap15:7.1_0: I’m a one who has twenty years of age
tha-ap15:7.2_0: a disciple of the four people,
tha-ap15:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap15:8.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap15:8.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap15:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nanda.
